derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French lecheros, from lecheor (see lecher)

entry.def: If you describe a man as lecherous, you disapprove of him because he behaves towards women in a way which shows he is only interested in them sexually.

example.ex: ...lecherous old men offering sweets at the school gate.
example.tran: 在学校门口分发糖果的老色鬼们

means.word_mean: 1. given to excessive indulgence in sexual activity;

auth_sentence.content: Grasped around the waist by a lecherous man.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Grasped around the waist by a lecherous man.
